content.rendered:
Directed by James Gunn. Brad Anderson. Jody Hill. Rosemary Rodriguez.

Written by James Gunn. James Gunn. William Moulton Marston. Joe Shuster. Jerry Siegel.

Cast . Danielle Brooks( Leota Adebayo ) . Freddie Stroma( Adrian Chase ) . Jennifer Holland( Agent Emilia Harcourt ) . Steve Agee( John Economos ) . Dee Bradley Baker( Eagly ) . Chukwudi Iwuji( Clemson Murn ) . Robert Patrick( Auggie Smith ) . Annie Chang( Detective Sophie Song ) . Lochlyn Munro( Detective Larry Fitzgibbon ) . Elizabeth Faith Ludlow( Keeya Adebayo ) . Rochelle Greenwood( Peggy ) . Zak Santiago( Prison Guard ) . Neil Webb( Cool Steve ) . Kevin O’Grady( Johnson ) . Bzhaun Rhoden( Young Man ) . Nhut Le( Judomaster ) . Christopher Heyerdahl( Captain Caspar Locke ) . Quinn Bennett( Young Chris ) . Liam Hughes( Keith ) . Mel Tuck( Auggie’s Neighbor ) . Rizwan Manji( Jamil ) . Alison Araya( Amber Calcaterra ) . Crystal Mudry( Annie Sturphausen ) . Lenny Jacobson( Evan Calcaterra ) . Paul Lazenby( Dickhead ) . Lissa Neptuno( Doctor ) . Darryl Scheelar( Dickhead ) . Troy Anthony Young( Terrified Man ) . Ryan Jefferson Booth( Racist Thug ) . Jen Znack( Skinhead Girl ) . Paul Tryl( Whitehood Wanker ) . Antonio Cupo( Royland Goff ) . Natalia Safran( Mrs. Goff ) . Neetu Garcha( Reporter ) . Alexander Brophy( Sad Eyed Kid ) . Jackson Ferguson( Goff Child 1 ) . Billy Christos Jr.( Chubster ) . Douglas Roy Dack( White Power Shithead ) . Juliette Ferguson( Goff Child 2 ) . Sage Brocklebank( Bodyguard ) . Elizabeth McCarthy Meek( Head Nurse ) . Trevor Hinton( Asshole Referee ) . Alice Matheson( Alfred E. Neuman ) . Faith Wright( Murn’s Inside Nurse ) . David Pavlov( Urkel ) . Yvette Ferguson( Receptionist ) . Michael Newman( Reporter ) . Troy Mundle( Harried Worker ) . Gabriela Reynoso( Lookie-Loo ) . Tim Zhang( Cabbie ) . Juliette Tidi( Canadian Tuxedo ) . Veena Sood( Captain Miele ) . David Beairsto( Judge William Judy ) . Brent Chapman( Fact Attack Host ) . Christopher Maxen Loteyro( Rubik’s Cube World Champion ) . Stephen Blackehart( Charlie (Gorilla) ) . Ursina Luther( Waitress ) . Maya Kooner( Jamil’s Daughter ) . Klarc Jerome Wilson( Taylor ) . Alice Comer( Pasketti Arms ) . Tyler Burrows( Frat Dude ) . Dan Ginnane( Frat Dude ) . Marcia D. Bennett( Teacher ) . Kris Kuruneri( Bartender ) . Cynthia Oroz-Guzman( Nurse ) . Jade Pawluk( Douchebag ) . Isaac Hotchkiss( 7-11 Cashier ) . Scott Pocha( Even Bigger Friend ) . Haig Sutherland( Dr. Hurwitz ) . Sarah Corrigan( Female Nurse ) . Philippe Collins( Male Nurse ) . Shahrokh Ferdowsi( Prison Guard (uncredited) ) . Viola Davis( Amanda Waller (uncredited) ) . Nicholas Dohy( Worker (uncredited) ) . Jason Momoa( Aquaman (uncredited) ) . Ezra Miller( The Flash (uncredited) ) . Tinashe Kajese( Flo Crawley (uncredited) ) . Brad Abramenko( Superman (uncredited) ) . Kimberley von Ilberg( Wonder Woman (uncredited) ) . Ben Hutchinson( Cop (uncredited) )

Language English.

Producers James Gunn. Matthew Miller. Peter Safran. Bryan H. Carroll. John Cena. Simon Hatt. Stacy A. Littlejohn. Fred Raskin. John Rickard. John H. Starke. Vicki Wagner. Lars P. Winther.

Production DC Entertainment. The Safran Company. Troll Court Entertainment.

 

Number of Seasons 2

Number of Episodes 9

Status OnGoing (2022–)
